title: Interaction mechanism of Al2O3 abrasive in tantalum chemical mechanical polishing
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29559-29568
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03743J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Rui Lei, Liang Jiang, Honglin Zhang, Yushan Chen, Jiaxin Zheng, Junhui Sun, Qijian Zhao, Linmao Qian
When Al2O3 slides on the tantalum surface, tribochemical reactions occur, forming chemical bond of Al–O–Ta. As Al2O3 moves, the bond is stretched and tantalum is detached. The findings provide mechanistic insight of Al2O3 abrasive in tantalum CMP.
